welcome_benefits: Complimentary Membership of Club Marriott, Swiggy One and Amazon Prime (On Spends of Rs. 1.5 Lakh Within 90 Days of Card Issuance)

Movie & Dining: 10% Off Up to ₹400 on Swiggy Dineout (Twice Each Month) and 2X RPs on Weekend Dining
Rewards Rate: Earn 5 RPs on Spends of Rs. 150 and 10X RPs on Spends Made on Smart Buy
Reward Redemption: Redeem Rewards on SmartBuy or for Airmiles and Cashback
Travel: Unlimited Lounge Access for Primary and Add-On Cardholders
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited Complimentary Domestic Lounge Visits Across India
International Lounge Access: Unlimited Complimentary International Lounge Visits Across the World
Insurance Benefits: Air Accident Insurance Worth Rs 2 Crore and Emergency Overseas Hospitalisation Worth Rs. 50 Lakh.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Spends ₹8 Lakh in a Year to Waive Renewal Fee
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Total Amount or Rs. 500 (Whichever is Higher)

product_details: This is a metal credit card.
The joining fee is Rs. 10,000 plus taxes.
5 Reward Points on spends of Rs. 150.
Complimentary Swiggy One, Club Marriott and Amazon Prime membership.
24 complimentary golf games in a year.
